member.name: T:Marox.Tools.Timer
member.summary: Use Timers to indicate 'points' between which you want to measure time

member.name: M:Marox.Tools.return_current_time_and_date
member.returns: Returns string in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

member.name: M:Marox.Tools.Autostart.isProgramRegisteredForStartup(System.Char!System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IsConst*)
member.summary: Checks whether application is registered for autostart

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.run
member.summary: Main method of the thread - needs to be implemented in the derived class!
member.remarks: If your thread works as the e.g loop, you should check the state of isThreadRunning flag inside your method implementation. (see THREAD example code)

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.Sleep(System.UInt32)
member.remarks: Meant to be used from within the desired thread, thus inside run() method or the main thread.

members.member:
Method returns when the thread execution has completed. (calls std::thread::join())
\throw std::exception if thread is not joinable

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.isJoinable
member.summary: Checks whether the thread is joinable.
member.returns: true if the thread is joinable

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.isThreadRunning
member.summary: Checks whether the thread is running.
member.returns: true if the thread is running, falseif it is not

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.threadStop
member.summary: Gives signal to finish thread loop execution.
member.remarks: Disables the isThreadRunning flag, so works only if you have e.g. while (isThreadRunning()) loop inside your thread method.

member.name: M:Marox.Threading.THREAD.threadStart(System.Boolean)
member.param: If set to true, the thread will be started with join
